title: Headline hunters
creator_credit: Ansus Films, Frank Godwin and Jonathan Ingrams
brief_description: In an English midlands town, the owner of a newspaper (The Clarion) has a heart attack. His rival, (The Bugle) uses nasty tactics to close the Clarion, but through the wiles of the Clarion owner’s children, this misfires badly, and ends happily. Cast includes Leonard Brockwell, Susan Payne, Stephen Garlick, Jeffrey Chandler, Bill Owen.
